meanings.sent1: I enquire about the weather before planning a picnic.
meanings.sent2: She always enquires about my day when we meet.
meanings.sent3: Why did the curious cat enquire about the mouse's whereabouts?
meanings.sent4: The detective had to enquire deeply to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The child enquired eagerly about the upcoming field trip.

meanings.sent1: The police officer will enquire the crime scene thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists enquire the effects of the new medicine on patients.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel enquired the contents of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: She decided to enquire the depths of her own mind through meditation.
meanings.sent5: The explorer enquired the unknown territory with caution.
